name: Jump Super Stars
description: Jump Super Stars (ジャンプスーパースターズ Janpu Sūpā Sutāzu) is a 2D fighting game developed by Ganbarion and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS. The game was released on August 8, 2005, only in Japan and accompanied the release of a red Nintendo DS. Its sequel, Jump Ultimate Stars, was released in Japan on November 23, 2006.
